short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help you control the video playback speed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help you control the video playback speed.
Current supported websites are:
1. bilibili
2. facebook workplace
3. echo360

Use "shift + ." to increase playback speed.
Use "shift + ," to decrease playback speed.
